DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA Healthy volunteer patient significant clinical suspicion renovascular hypertension . Subjects able understand inform consent study . Subjects must able hold breath 20 second interval . Patients must clinically stable judged physician able tolerate MR study 1.52 hour duration . EXCLUSION CRITERIA Any contraindication MR study include : pacemaker implant electronic device ; cochlear implant ; metal eye ; embed shrapnel fragment ; cerebral aneurysm clip ; medical infusion pump . Allergy gadolinium , iodinate contrast medium , ACEIs , sulphurcontaining medication . Patients hematocrit 30 . Severe anemia may predispose hypotension captopril . Patients hyperkalemia ( plasma potassium : 5.0 mmol/L ) , risk arrhythmia . Clinically unstable patient unable tolerate 12 hour MR study . Examples medical condition would lead exclusion include unstable angina , dyspnea rest , severe pain rest , severe back pain . Pregnancy . Nursing mother . Subjects claustrophobic unable tolerate MR imaging . Patients serum creatinine concentration 4mg/dl . Bilateral renal stent . Healthy subject must abnormality detect dipstick urinalysis , systolic BP 140 mmHg diastolic BP 90 mmHg screen examination abnormal BUN creatinine level blood .
